com.dinggoapplication.Entity

Class Deal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dinggoapplication.Entity.Deal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PercentageDiscount, TierDiscount

    public abstract class Deal
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class to hold all the different type of deals
    Version:
    2.1 Created by Leon on 16/2/2015.
    Author:
    Lee Quee Leong & Seah Siu Ngee
